name: Crazy Rich Man
description:
What would you do if you become a rich man?
Start a company, train staff, and create a grand business empire!
Spend money, enjoy privileges, date belle, and start your new life!
Business struggles, money, belle, limousines, villas, play Crazy Rich Man, become a business tycoon of the generation!

Game features:
[Date belle, closely interact with them]
Date with many types of belle and start a romantic life.

[Recruit talents, lay foundation for your career]
Recruit staff to join the company, train employees to enhance their strength that helps you make acquisitions, stop financial crisis and expand your global business empire!

[Simulate business war, become the wolf of Wall Street]
Real financial war experience, corporate management, acquisitions, business negotiations, financial storm, let you experience the commercial battlefield without fire and blood, experience the cruelty and excitement of commercial warfare.
